subject: Energy Amplifier Top Tips - "Domain of Furious Thunder"
content:
The "Domain of Furious Thunder" in the "Twisted Realm" opens today! (Travelers must first complete the domain "Where Shadows Writhe")


​



● Ley Line Disorder:


​


A Plasma Field will appear at the edge of the challenge area once the challenge begins. The area covered by the field will gradually expand as the challenge proceeds.


​


While within the field, characters will be hit by a lightning strike once every 2s and take Electro DMG.



● Strategies


​


Paimon advises Travelers to avoid being exposed to the Plasma Field for an extended period.

As for those opponents who are far away and always in the Plasma Field... Characters who specialize in using Bows might be better suited to deal with them! Travelers can also use Irminsul Fruit Fragments to increase Healing Bonus or Shield Strength.


​


Both the Electrohammer Vanguard and Pyroslinger Bracer can receive an elemental buff, but these buffs have corresponding weaknesses.

For the Electrohammer Vanguard, Paimon recommends that Travelers use a certain element that reacts with Electro, and for the Pyroslinger Bracer, a certain element that reacts with Pyro. As long as you destroy their buffs, the battle will be way easier!

subject: Energy Amplifier Top Tips - Domain of Chaos
content:
In this challenge, Travelers will have to face those strange big guys... But don't worry, Paimon will tell you how to deal with them! You can also challenge the Domain in Co-Op Mode, so give it a try with some friends~ (Travelers must first complete the domain "Frost-Worn Space")




Ley Line Disorder:



A Chaos Cluster will chase characters around the field once the challenge begins. When the Chaos Cluster comes into contact with a character or opponents, it will deal immense DMG to them. If it touches a character, it will disappear.



The size of these clusters and the DMG they deal will gradually decrease over time, but its speed will gradually increase.



Strategies



When the clusters appear, Travelers can swiftly adjust their own position to lure the clusters to come into contact with opponents first and deal DMG to them.



Don't be scared by how terrifying these big guys look, as attacking their exposed cores can paralyze them temporarily. Taking advantage of this weakness will greatly increase your efficiency in combat!

Additionally, utilize Frozen reactions to exert control over opponents for a brief period of time.

Additionally, utilize Frozen reactions to exert control over opponents for a brief period of time.

subject: Energy Amplifier Top Tips - "Domain of Heresy"
content:
Hi Travelers~

The Domain of Heresy in the Twisted Realm has opened! Travelers will face a special opponent — Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents.

In this issue of Top Tips, Paimon will introduce you to this opponent's special abilities and strategies to deal with it. Let's take a look~


​



● Ley Line Disorder


​


The Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents has Attendants, in which a new set of Attendants will be summoned at fixed intervals, replacing the previous group. These Attendants will enhance the Abyss Herald's abilities.

Each Attendant increases the Elemental RES and Physical RES of the Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents, and will also heal it every 12s. The more Attendants there are on the field, the stronger the enhancements and healing abilities.


​


All Attendants will be destroyed when the Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents enters the Dark Descent state due to taking DMG, and they will not be summoned again.


● Strategies


​


When there are no Attendants on the field, the Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents will lose the aforementioned enhancements and healing abilities. Paimon recommends that Travelers use Talents that deal AoE or have control effects to take out the Attendants in the field first.


​


When the Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents's HP is low, it will enter the Dark Descent state. Paimon thinks Travelers can use elements that react with Hydro to defeat it.

subject: Character Teaser - "Eula: Midnight Encounter at the Tavern" | Genshin Impact
content:
Should you be willing to share a table with a less-than-sober Eula, drinking alone in a Mondstadt tavern deep into the night, you might hear her stories about the many "scores" she'll have to settle due to the day's events.


But... is she really going to take revenge for these things?
contentOriginal:
Should you be willing to share a table with a less-than-sober Eula, drinking alone in a Mondstadt tavern deep into the night, you might hear her stories about the many "scores" she'll have to settle due to the day's events.


But... is she really going to take revenge for these things?

subject: Severing a Sinner's Shackles With a Whirling Dance
content:
"The Knights of Favonius values one's abilities and deeds more than their background and lineage. Eula is indeed an outstanding knight, and there is no need to hold her identity as a descendant of the ancient nobles against her." — Jean Gunnhildr


Eula

Spindrift Knight

Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company

Cryo

Aphros Delos



As the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company and the renowned Spindrift Knight, Eula spends most of her time out in the wild and has won much acclaim leading her team of scouts on patrol. The knights stationed in the mountains and valleys are often the target of sneak attacks from monsters, but Eula has always been able to resolve these crises by rendering swift support. She has also led proactive attacks to destroy Abyss Order strongholds time and again, nipping their nefarious plots in the bud.


Due to Eula's background, many contradictions surround her — she is a descendant of the Lawrence clan and is considered by the citizens of Mondstadt to be the embodiment of the blood of sinners. Despite everything, she severed ties with her clan many years ago and joined the Knights of Favonius. Yet prejudice is not so easily dispelled, and Eula has not been treated fairly. In the eyes of Mondstadt's citizens, she remains an "outsider", or even a "dangerous individual."


Years of such experiences have led Eula to build an invisible shield to protect herself from unwarranted harm. The term "vengeance" is perhaps the most visible edge of this shield. Only by disregarding wild gossip and trying to accept the logic of her approach to the world can one come to understand the truth behind the complex shell of this young woman.

Only by disregarding wild gossip and trying to accept the logic of her approach to the world can one come to understand the truth behind the complex shell of this young woman.

subject: "Windtrace" Event: Compete and Earn Primogems
content:
During the event, Travelers can talk to Gygax in Mondstadt to participate in the Windtrace game. Win Windtrace Coins as well as obtain Primogems, the namecard "Celebration: Peekaboo!", Character EXP Materials, Mora, and other rewards.

 

〓Event Duration〓

2021-05-14 10:00:00 - 2021-05-24 03:59:59 

 

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

 

〓Event Details〓

● On the first day of the event, the maximum number of Windtrace Coins you can carry is 1,200. This amount will increase by 600 for each of the 6 days after that, up to a maximum of 4,800 Windtrace Coins. Use the matching function to find randomized games and obtain Windtrace Coins.

● Accumulate certain amounts of Windtrace Coins to claim the corresponding rewards. Complete Windtrace Challenges to obtain additional Mora rewards.

● Before participating in the game, you must first unlock all of the Statues of the Seven located in the corresponding event areas. If you have not unlocked the Statues of the Seven of the corresponding areas, you will only be able to play games in the event areas where you have already unlocked them. You can view the unlocked event areas in the Contested Zone preview.

 

※ Windtrace Coins can only be obtained while playing in randomized games using the matching function. You will be unable to obtain Windtrace Coins while playing in a custom Co-Op party.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Captain Eula Lawrence, Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. As the Spindrift Knight, I extend to you my greetings.
content:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~


Today, we'd like to introduce to you the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company, Captain Eula Lawrence, the Spindrift Knight!


Known as the Spindrift Knight, Eula wields her blade with consummate skill, but perhaps more importantly, she is well-versed in strategy and possesses great courage and excellent intuition. Grand Master Varka had nothing but the highest praise for her, even declaring once that she was the Dandelion Knight's equal on the battlefield.
contentOriginal:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~


Today, we'd like to introduce to you the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company, Captain Eula Lawrence, the Spindrift Knight!


Known as the Spindrift Knight, Eula wields her blade with consummate skill, but perhaps more importantly, she is well-versed in strategy and possesses great courage and excellent intuition. Grand Master Varka had nothing but the highest praise for her, even declaring once that she was the Dandelion Knight's equal on the battlefield.

subject: Voice Actor Announcement
content:
It takes two to tango. Shall we?

Travelers, come listen to the voice talent for "Spindrift Knight" — Eula!



Voice Actor

EN VA: Suzie Yeung

JP VA: SATO Rina


Click here to listen >>>https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/character/mondstadt?char=17

subject: "Windtrace" Event Gameplay Details
content:
Windtrace, the classic game that hands down Mondstadt's history, is once again being held!

Players will be split into two sides — the Rebels, members of the ancient resistance, and a Hunter sent by the ancient aristocracy — and have a battle of wits in the Contested Zones.


〓Event Duration〓

2021/05/14 10:00:00 – 2021/05/24 03:59:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Gameplay Details〓

During the event period, travelers can take part in a game of Windtrace at Gygax's, and obtain Windtrace Coins. Accumulate certain amounts of Windtrace Coins to claim rewards such as Primogems, Event Namecard "Celebration: Peekaboo!", Character EXP Materials, Mora, and more.

Complete Windtrace Challenges to obtain additional Mora rewards.

​


​



​



"Disguise" - This Windward Art will replace your Elemental Skill

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.


"Lay Bait" - This Windward Art will replace your Normal Attack

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.


If the Hunter attempts to capture the Bait, their vision will be obscured for a short time.

​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.


"Transparency" - This Windward Art will replace your Normal Attack

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.


Secret Favor

In addition to the above Windward Arts, Travelers can also use "Secret Favor," an art that can be decisive in determining victory or defeat.

During the game, "Favors" will descend upon the area at random. Picking up one such "Favor" will help charge one's "Secret Favor."

​

Both Rebels and Hunters can pick up Secret Favors.

When Rebels pick up a Favor, they will obtain the Windward Art - "Starstep."

"Starstep" - This Windward Art will replace your Elemental Burst (this Windward Art is only obtained after picking up Favors)

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.


​




Hunter's Windward Arts

"Sensor Aura" - This Windward Art will replace your Normal Attack

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.



"Mysterious Hunch" - This Windward Art will replace your Normal Attack

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.


"Capture!" - This Windward Art will replace your Elemental Skill

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.



When Hunters pick up a Favor, they will obtain a Windward Art - "Insight," "Hunter's Intuition," or "Imprisoning Curse"

"Imprisoning Curse" - This Windward Art will replace your Elemental Burst (this Windward Art is only obtained after picking up Favors)

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.



"Insight" - This Windward Art will replace your Elemental Burst (this Windward Art is only obtained after picking up Favors)

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.



"Hunter's Intuition" - This Windward Art will replace your Elemental Burst (this Windward Art is only obtained after picking up Favors)

​



​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.



When time is almost up, the Hunter's Movement SPD will be greatly increased, and the CD of "Capture!" will be decreased.

​

*The two-player game mode is in the development mode, the official version requires four people to start the game.

Images are for illustrative purposes only and are not indicative of the final product.



Contested Zone

When you participate in Windtrace, a Contested Zone will be randomly chosen from among the areas that have already been unlocked.

​



Before participating in the game, you must first unlock all of the Statues of the Seven located in the corresponding event areas. If you have not unlocked the Statues of the Seven of the corresponding areas, you will only be able to play games in the event areas where you have already unlocked them. You can view the unlocked event areas in the Contested Zone preview.

​



On the first day of the event, the maximum number of Windtrace Coins you can carry is 1,200. This amount will increase by 600 for each of the 6 days after that, up to a maximum of 4,800 Windtrace Coins. Use the matching function to find randomized games and obtain Windtrace Coins.

When forming a custom Co-Op party to play this game or when your Windtrace Coins have reached the current maximum, you will not obtain any Windtrace Coins.

That's all the latest details for this event~ Stay tuned for more notices about new event gameplay and details!

You can view the unlocked event areas in the Contested Zone preview.

​

That's all the latest details for this event~ Stay tuned for more notices about new event gameplay and details!

subject: "Aphros Delos Chapter" Story Quest Overview
content:
Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use Story Keys to unlock Eula's Story Quest "Aphros Delos Chapter."

The Story Quest feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)

 

〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after 2021-05-18 18:00:00

 

〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Event Wish "Born of Ocean Swell" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Dance of the Shimmering Wave" Eula (Cryo)!
content:
​


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

 

〓Event Wish Duration〓

2021-05-18 18:00:00 - 2021-06-08 14:59:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Dance of the Shimmering Wave" Eula (Cryo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro), "Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu (Hydro), and "Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean" Beidou (Electro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rate for Song of Broken Pines (Claymore) and Aquila Favonia (Sword)!
content:
​


Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!


〓Event Wish Duration〓

2021-05-18 18:00:00 - 2021-06-08 14:59:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon Song of Broken Pines (Claymore) and the 5-star weapon Aquila Favonia (Sword) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During the event wish, the 4-star weapons Sacrificial Sword (Sword), Rainslasher (Claymore), Dragon's Bane (Polearm), Sacrificial Fragments (Catalyst), and Rust (Bow) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

※ Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: New Character Demo - "Eula: Flickering Candlelight" | Genshin Impact
content:
With the dance of a sinner, a rebellious heir shatters the shackles of glacial ice.


Under the curtain of the dark night, the flickering candlelight illuminates the sharp edge of a cold blade.
contentOriginal:
With the dance of a sinner, a rebellious heir shatters the shackles of glacial ice.


Under the curtain of the dark night, the flickering candlelight illuminates the sharp edge of a cold blade.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Eula: Surging Frost" | Genshin Impact
content:
From an ocean of frost, a sudden towering wave surges forth. With the clash of a blade comes the crash of a wave, delivering a piercing-cold strike that eliminates countless threats to Mondstadt.


On Eula's self-styled path of vengeance, she has fought to break free from the shackles of her bloodline and finally discover the person she truly is.

On Eula's self-styled path of vengeance, she has fought to break free from the shackles of her bloodline and finally discover the person she truly is.

subject: "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" Event - Themed Character-Trial Event
content:
During the event, Travelers may assemble a team with the specific trial characters provided and challenge six trials of different themes. Complete the trial quests to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Talent Level-Up Materials.


〓Event Duration〓

2021-05-21 10:00:00 - 2021-05-31 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Details〓

● "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" has a total of six trials with different themes. Starting with the first day of the event, two new trials will be unlocked every two days.

● In the trials of "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon," you must activate all the Ancient Runes within the time limit to gain access to the Final Challenge.

● Each trial has a different Ley Line Disorder and the distribution of enemies and trap mechanisms also varies.

● In the trials, you may only use the specific trial characters provided, and Elemental Resonances will not be available to you.

● If you have the trial character, the said trial character in the trial will adopt the Constellation levels of the character you actually own. If you do not have the trial character, the trial character's default Constellation level will be Lv. 0.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" Gameplay Details
content:
During the event, Travelers may assemble a team with the specific trial characters provided and challenge six trials of different themes. Complete the trial quests to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Talent Level-Up Materials.


〓Event Duration〓

2021/05/21 10:00 – 2021/05/31 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above



​


Select the appropriate characters according to the distribution and type of your opponents and the Ley Line Disorders. This will make your combat experience much easier. (Elemental Resonances will not be available to you in the trial)


​


If you have the trial character, the said trial character in the trial will adopt the Constellation levels of the character you actually own. If you do not have the trial character, the trial character's default Constellation level will be Lv. 0.


​



​


There are also automated weapons systems within "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" that will detect and attack any intruders. Use the appropriate elemental attacks to temporarily disable these devices.

You can choose from various challenges and Benediction mechanics within the trials. Complete these challenges to obtain certain bonus effects.

During the trial, you cannot obtain various effects by using food items. If you want to restore your characters' HP or defeat opponents more effectively, try looking for the different Benediction mechanics within the trial~


​


Well, that's all for now~ See you next time!

subject: May 24 Developers Discussion — Serenitea Pot Load Optimization... Let's Go!
content:
Today Paimon had a chat with the developers~╰(*°▽°*)╯ Let's see what they have in store for us~

Special Message: May 24 Developers Discussion — Serenitea Pot Load Optimization... Let's Go!


Q: Will there be a higher load limit for the Serenitea Pot?

A: Travelers have sent us much feedback regarding the load limit for the Serenitea Pot. Paimon has brought this to the attention of the developers~ (Shhhh! Don't mention it)

In Version 1.6, the developers have increased the load limit of the Serenitea Pot, but the actual load that Travelers can reach will depend on how much your device can support.


Q: The dialogue with the teapot spirit is cumbersome. To get to the Shop, Trust Rank, and Building menus, you have to go through the dialogue again. 

A: The developers are on the case. In Version 1.6, after Travelers have selected an option in the dialogue with Tubby, click return to head back to the previous menu. Travelers will no longer need to repeat the dialogue with Tubby to access other options. The development team is hard at work optimizing the Serenitea Pot experience, so Travelers are welcome to leave feedback in the comments section below~


Q: When will the Serenitea Pot have paved roads?

A: While visiting the developers, Paimon caught a glimpse of paved roads. Paimon also saw the team planning some stones with furnishings floating in the air. After smoothing out some rough edges, Travelers will get to try this feature out for themselves in a future update~ (Shhhh! You didn't hear this from Paimon!)


Q: When will the room on the second floor in the Serenitea Pot open?

A: From Version 1.6 onwards, the room on the second floor in the Serenitea Pot will open for decoration. Don't forget to spruce the place up!


Q: Will characters I own be able to make themselves at home in my realm?

A: There will be more details about the Companion Move-In feature later on.


Q: It's very inconvenient that I cannot use the Crafting Bench in Co-Op Mode.

A: The Travelers have spoken, and the developers have listened. Improvements to the Crafting Bench Co-Op Mode are coming~

Crafting items at the Crafting Bench in Co-Op Mode will be implemented in Version 1.6~ The unlocking of recipes will be subject to the Traveler's own progress.

If the Traveler crafted while in a friend's world, they will be able to keep the crafted item upon returning to their own world.


Q: Is there a way to locate Co-Op teammates faster?

A: Paimon has you covered! o(^▽^)o In Version 1.6, when a teammate is not within range of the currently displayed map area, a teammate marker will be displayed at the edge of the map. Travelers can click on that marker to quickly locate their teammates.

subject: "Mimi Tomo" Event -  Take Part to Earn Furnishing Blueprints
content:
During the event, complete the investigation of the "Unusual Hilichurl" to obtain rewards such as Liyue-style Furnishing Blueprints, Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Mora.

 

〓Event Duration〓

Event Gameplay Period:2021-05-27 10:00:00 - 2021-06-06 03:59:59

"The Lost Hilichurl" Quest:2021-06-06 04:00:00 - 2021-06-08 03:59:59

 

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

 

〓Event Details〓

● During the event, there are seven Sighting Locations to investigate. Once the event begins, one investigation location will be unlocked each day.

● With assistance from Hilichurlian expert Ella Musk, the Traveler is tasked with finding hilichurls that are open to communication and asking them for more information on the whereabouts of the Unusual Hilichurl.

● After completing requests for hilichurls, they will inform you of the time period during which the Unusual Hilichurl will be active, and also indicate the approximate location. Track down and defeat the Unusual Hilichurl at these times to obtain rewards.

● During the event, after a Traveler accepts the investigation quest in Co-Op Mode, only the host can carry out the quest.

● After the event gameplay period ends, Travelers who have completed the "Mimi Tomo" quest can accept "The Lost Hilichurl" quest at Katheryne's location in Mondstadt. Complete the quest to claim the corresponding rewards.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

〓Event Details〓

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: "Mimi Tomo" Gameplay Details
content:
Hey there, Travelers~ The Mimi Tomo event is about to begin!


A certain "Unusual Hilichurl" has been spotted gathering its fellow 'churls out in the wild recently... Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild is thus calling on Travelers to investigate this matter. Together with Hilichurlian expert Ella Musk, find hilichurls that are open to communication and ask them for more information on the whereabouts of the Unusual Hilichurl!



Additionally, new missions have also been added to Realm of Diversion. Complete them to receive BEP.



〓Event Duration〓

• Event Gameplay Duration: 2021/05/27/ 10:00 – 2021/06/06/ 03:59 (Server Time)

• "The Lost Hilichurl" Quest Duration: 2021/06/06/ 04:00 – 2021/06/08/ 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Description〓

You can obtain clues to find the Unusual Hilichurl by communicating with hilichurls who are willing to talk.



Next, let's look in more detail at the specific content in the event~

• Search for hilichurls who are willing to talk

You can find the Sighting Locations where hilichurls can be found by following the prompts on the event page.



After arriving at the Sighting Location, look with Ella Musk for hilichurls who are willing to talk within the quest area.



• Complete the hilichurls' commissions

Please try to communicate with the hilichurls! They may have commissions they would like to ask you to help them complete~


If you don't understand any phrases or sentences while communicating with the hilichurls, simply check the Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian kindly provided by Ella Musk (you can check the handbook in Inventory > Quest or on the event page).



After completing the hilichurls' commissions, they will reveal clues as to the time when the Unusual Hilichurl will appear, and help to mark out locations where the Unusual Hilichurl may appear.



• Search for and defeat the Unusual Hilichurl

After obtaining the clues, reach the designated location at the correct time to find and defeat the Unusual Hilichurl. You can adjust the time by going to the Paimon Menu > Time.



After defeating the Unusual Hilichurl, you can obtain rewards such as Primogems, Furnishing Blueprints, Hero's Wit, and Mora.



This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


〓Things to Note〓

There are seven Sighting Locations in this event, and only after completing the investigation for the previous Sighting Location can you unlock the quest at the next location.

Alright, Paimon's done explaining for now~ Paimon will be back with more info in the future, bye-bye Travelers!

subject: 1.6 Special Program Announcement
content:
Dear Travelers,


Today Paimon brings you great news! The Special Program for "Genshin Impact" version 1.6 will be officially released on May 28 at 11:00 AM (UTC-5)!


During the special program, you will discover all the juicy details of version 1.6. In addition to that, you can get redemption codes and other incredible gifts that we prepared especially for you. Do not miss out!


The Special Program will be hosted on our official YouTube channel >>> https://www.youtube.com/c/GenshinImpact


Paimon will see you all there!

subject: Version 1.6 "Midsummer Island Adventure" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
In the sweltering summer, a strange letter is discovered on the windowsill, with a spiraling fog shrouding a mystery far away.


Following the sound of the crashing waves to find the truth, sparks dance on the horizon as the fleeing sun shines brightly across the sky.


For her best friend and for the great adventure ahead, our youngest knight is ready to embark on her journey — let's go!

In the sweltering summer, a strange letter is discovered on the windowsill, with a spiraling fog shrouding a mystery far away.


Following the sound of the crashing waves to find the truth, sparks dance on the horizon as the fleeing sun shines brightly across the sky.


For her best friend and for the great adventure ahead, our youngest knight is ready to embark on her journey — let's go!

subject: "Overflowing Mastery" Event - Double Drops With Talent Level-Up Materials
content:
During the event, Travelers who successfully challenge Talent Level-Up Material Domains and who consume Original Resin to obtain rewards will receive double the output.

 

〓Event Duration〓

2021-05-31 04:00:00 - 2021-06-07 03:59:59

 

〓Eligibility〓

After activating Talent Level-Up Material Domains

 

〓Event Details〓

● During the "Overflowing Mastery" event, Travelers who successfully challenge the Talent Level-Up Material Domains "Forsaken Rift" and "Taishan Mansion" and consume Original Resin to obtain rewards will receive double the output. A total of three opportunities to gain double drops will be available each day!

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)
